messages.content: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Devizes – in 2017 Labour came second with double the vote of the Lib Dems. We can win and we will put people and planet before profit and privilege.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight against the Johnson pledge to pursue a hard Brexit and privatise public services.
Believe in a fairer, more equal society under Labour.
Eliminated homelessness sleeping on our streets under the last Labour Government.
Challenge local MP Claire Perry regarding dangerous fracking and Brexit, and supported local community meetings defending NHS assets.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: A new Conservative candidate is being parachuted in who knows nothing about our constituency.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Devizes – in 2017 Labour came second with double the vote of the Lib Dems.

issues.brexitEurope: Signed the Johnson pledge to pursue a hard Brexit.
issues.education: Worked with parents supporting the fight against the closure of Braeside and Oxenwood outdoor education centers, supported local kids campaigning against closure of a special needs school, and a new super-school in Rowde.
issues.health: Hosted a cross-party public meeting as part of the campaign to save NHS assets.
issues.lawCrime: Eliminated homelessness sleeping on our streets under the last Labour Government.

community.content: Supported local kids campaigning against the closure of a special needs school in Rowde.

leaflet.personalStatement: Rachael Schneider Ross lives locally, knows the area and the issues.

politicalExperience.achievements: Lobbied Wiltshire Council to declare a climate emergency, challenged MP Claire Perry, worked to support local community meetings defending NHS assets, worked with parents against school closures.

images.caption: Labour Party members bringing our message to the public.
Campaigning at County Hall to save Oxenwood and Braeside.

examples: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Devizes – in 2017 Labour came second with double the vote of the Lib Dems.
Wiltshire has lost £300m in grants from central government.
Significant parts of the country (like this) have seen their services diminished, with 30% deprivation in our schools.
We will put people and planet before profit and privilege.
Labour has a different message, different values, and different priorities.
Worked with parents supporting the fight against the closure of Braeside and Oxenwood outdoor education centers.
Supported local kids campaigning against the closure of a special needs school in Rowde.
Eliminated homelessness sleeping on our streets under the last Labour Government.
Hosted a cross-party public meeting as part of the campaign to save NHS assets.
Rachael Schneider Ross lives locally, knows the area and the issues.
Wiltshire has lost £300m in grants from central government.
Significant parts of the country (like this) have seen their services diminished, with 30% deprivation in our schools.
Lobbied Wiltshire Council to declare a climate emergency.
Labour would not have voted for the draconian austerity measures promoted by the Tories in coalition with the Liberal Democrats.
New Conservative candidate is being parachuted in who knows nothing about our constituency.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Rachael Schneider Ross lives locally, knows the area and the issues.
